TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void Action<in T>(T obj);
.class public auto ansi sealed Action`1<- T> extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub Action(Of In T)(obj As T)
generic <typename T> public delegate void Action(T obj);

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 這個委派所封裝之方法的參數型別。

span.span: The type of the parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

param.name: obj
param.span: 這個委派所封裝之方法的參數。

span.span: The parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

summary.span: 封裝具有單一參數的方法，並且不會傳回值。

span.span: Encapsulates a method that has a single parameter and does not return a value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用做為參數傳遞給方法，而不必明確宣告自訂委派的委派。You can use the delegate to pass a method as a parameter without explicitly declaring a custom delegate. 封裝的方法必須對應到這個委派所定義的方法簽章。The encapsulated method must correspond to the method signature that is defined by this delegate. 這表示封裝的方法必須有一個由值傳遞給它的參數，而且必須傳回值。This means that the encapsulated method must have one parameter that is passed to it by value, and it must not return a value. (在 C# 中，此方法必須傳回`void`。(In C#, the method must return `void`. 在 Visual Basic 中，它必須由定義`Sub`...`End Sub`In Visual Basic, it must be defined by the `Sub`…`End Sub` 建構。construct. 它也可以傳回值，則會忽略這個值的方法。）通常，這種方法用來執行作業。It can also be a method that returns a value that is ignored.) Typically, such a method is used to perform an operation. > [!NOTE] > 若要參考具有一個參數並傳回值的方法，使用泛型改為委派。To reference a method that has one parameter and returns a value, use the generic delegate instead. 當您使用委派，您不需要明確地定義這個委派會封裝具有單一參數的方法。When you use the delegate, you do not have to explicitly define a delegate that encapsulates a method with a single parameter. 例如，下列程式碼明確宣告委派，名為`DisplayMessage`，並將指派參考方法或`ShowWindowsMessage`其委派執行個體的方法。For example, the following code explicitly declares a delegate named `DisplayMessage` and assigns a reference to either the method or the `ShowWindowsMessage` method to its delegate instance. [!code-cpp[System.Action~1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~1/cpp/delegate.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Action~1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~1/cs/Delegate.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Action~1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~1/vb/Delegate.vb#1)] 下列範例中簡化這個程式碼，以具現化而不是明確地定義新的委派，並為其指派具名的方法的委派。The following example simplifies this code by instantiating the delegate instead of explicitly defining a new delegate and assigning a named method to it. [!code-cpp[System.Action~1#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~1/cpp/action`1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Action~1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~1/cs/Action1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Action~1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~1/vb/Action1.vb#2)] 您也可以使用具有在 C# 中，匿名方法委派，如下列範例所示。You can also use the delegate with anonymous methods in C#, as the following example illustrates. (如匿名方法的簡介，請參閱 < [ 匿名方法](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/anonymous-methods.md)。)(For an introduction to anonymous methods, see [Anonymous Methods](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/anonymous-methods.md).) [!code-csharp[System.Action~1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~1/cs/Anon.cs#3)] 您也可以指派至 lambda 運算式委派執行個體，如下列範例所示。You can also assign a lambda expression to an delegate instance, as the following example illustrates. (如需 lambda 運算式，請參閱 < [Lambda 運算式](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/lambda-expressions.md)。)(For an introduction to lambda expressions, see [Lambda Expressions](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/lambda-expressions.md).) [!code-csharp[System.Action~1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~1/cs/Lambda.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Action~1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action~1/vb/lambda.vb#4)] 並每個方法會採用委派為參數。The and methods each take an delegate as a parameter. 委派所封裝的方法可讓您在陣列或清單中的每個項目上執行的動作。The method encapsulated by the delegate allows you to perform an action on each element in the array or list. 此範例會使用方法，以提供圖例。The example uses the method to provide an illustration. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用要列印的內容委派物件。The following example demonstrates the use of the delegate to print the contents of a object. 在此範例中，`Print`方法用來對主控台顯示清單的內容。In this example, the `Print` method is used to display the contents of the list to the console. 此外，C# 範例也會示範使用匿名方法，來對主控台顯示內容。In addition, the C# example also demonstrates the use of anonymous methods to display the contents to the console. 請注意，此範例沒有明確宣告變數。Note that the example does not explicitly declare an variable. 相反地，採用單一參數的方法，不會傳回值，以將參考傳遞方法，其單一參數是委派。Instead, it passes a reference to a method that takes a single parameter and that does not return a value to the method, whose single parameter is an delegate. 同樣地，在 C# 範例中，委派不明確執行個體化，因為匿名方法的簽章的簽章相符預期的委派方法。Similarly, in the C# example, an delegate is not explicitly instantiated because the signature of the anonymous method matches the signature of the delegate that is expected by the method. [!code-csharp[System.Action_PrintExample#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action_PrintExample/cs/action.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.Action_PrintExample#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Action_PrintExample/vb/action.vb#01)]
